Options -MultiViews
DirectoryIndex index.html

<IfModule mod_rewrite.c>
  RewriteEngine On
  RewriteBase /
  RewriteCond %{REQUEST_FILENAME} -f [OR]
  RewriteCond %{REQUEST_FILENAME} -d
  RewriteRule ^ - [L]
  RewriteCond %{REQUEST_URI} \.(css|js|png|jpe?g|gif|svg|ico|txt|pdf|webp|map|woff2?|ttf|eot)$ [NC]
  RewriteRule ^ - [L]
  RewriteRule . /index.html [L]
</IfModule>
<IfModule !mod_rewrite.c>
  FallbackResource /index.html
</IfModule>
